title: A believer to-be
description: A novella targeting ambitious, dreamy teenagers specifically but may be enjoyed by any one at any age.Why does Yaseen call himself “a believer to-be”, and why does living with him feel like flying on a bird's wing or riding on a waterfall? Reading this novel answers these questions while giving you the chance to enjoy the warmth of Yaseen Rady's family: a family that never loses hope, no matter how difficult life gets.
author: Gehan Abouelseoud
